                throws DotDataException,
                       DotStateException,
                       DotSecurityException
        Description copied from interface: VersionableAPI
        Remove the reference to the live version for this identifier. This is useful to unpublish an asset.
        Specified by:
        removeLive in interface VersionableAPI
        Parameters:
        identifier - identifier of the asset to be left without live version
        Throws:
        DotDataException

        DotSecurityException

      • removeLive

        public void removeLive(java.lang.String identifier,
              long lang)
                throws DotDataException,
                       DotStateException,
                       DotSecurityException
        Description copied from interface: VersionableAPI
        Remove the reference to the live version for this identifier. This is useful to unpublish an asset. This is the contentlet specific method as we need the language_id for those cases
        Specified by:
        removeLive in interface VersionableAPI
        Parameters:
        identifier - identifier of the asset to be left without live version
        lang - language id of the contentlet

        Description copied from interface: VersionableAPI
